resources.string: The worst of physical nicotine withdrawal symptoms pass. (1 week)
Lung function begins to improve, and shortness of breath decreases. (3 months)
The fine hairs (cilia) start to regrow in the lungs, causing exhaustion and shortess of breath to improve. (9 months)
The risk of disease in the coronary vessels is reduced by half. (1 year)
The risk of heart attack drops significantly. (2 years)
The risk of having a stroke reaches almost that of a non-smoker. (5 years)
The lungs have almost fully recovered, as pre-cancerous cells are replaced by healthy cells. (10 years)
